Articles.Content:
Hi,

I present the true story of deorbiting "Ionic Sputnik", an ion-powered probe that has "lost" all power. The trick is trying to save it, despite no parachutes, no rockets, and no way to grab it. The only thing available is an aging X-3 SSTO spaceplane and star pilot Bill Kerman . . .

Javascript is disabled. View full album

-G
Why didn't you just install KAS? Epic try, tough.
